channel.title: [Joke Faction Suggestion] The Silent
channel.description:
liek the cult.
**The mega mind** spawns in all games with silent
**Death immune** (passive) immune to death at night
**sneaky** (passive) detective will see you as "not suspicious" nights 1-3; if you die night 1,2, or 3, the hitman will become the megamind
**convert** (night, infinite uses/ 1-day cool-down) attempt to convert the target into the silent.
----------------- **The hitman** spawns in all games with the silent
**Hit** (night, infinite uses) kill your target
**forage for cyanide** (night, infinite uses) gain a use of the "cyanide" ability
**cyanide** (day, 1 uses) poison your target. they will die in two nights.
**Silence** (day, 2 uses) your target will be unable to speak for 10 seconds.
---------------------------- **The extortionist** what the megamind converts players into
**promote self** (passive) if there is no hitman, you become hitman
**Blackmail** (night, infinite uses) player can't speak tomorrow.
------------------------- **The detective** spawns with silent, like paladin in cult games.
**shed disguises** (night, infinite uses) determine if your target is a member of the silent.
**Posse formation** (night, 1 uses) if your target is a blue dragon non-royal, you will turn them into a knight; you will them who you are, regardless.
---------------------
Additional notes: I thought it was a pretty cool idea, great addition to the game. Please leave suggestions below!
